Service Details: - Provides assistance to BC First Nations' communities to develop and sustain safer and healthier communities by providing Emergency Preparedness and Response, Fire, Forest Management, and Education and Training Services to support First Nations Fire Services in the province- Manages the National Satellite Initiative which provides increased internet access to Canada's remote communities
